title: Wearable Aromatherapy Balm - Spiritual Gangsta
description: Find the unique and exotic with this Wearable Aromatherapy Balm - Spiritual Gangsta from Om Gallery. Choose from a dazzling selection of fair trade products from jewelry to garden décor and home lighting!
cleaned_text: GRADE | VEGAN | SKIN-SAFE WEARABLE AROMATHERAPY is worn on your skin and hair as a natural perfume. Wear this as a single scent, or layer it with others directly on your skin and hair. SMELLS LIKE : Citrus and soul with a lemongrass power kick! It has an earthy, citrus with some warmth and woodiness. NOTE : Power Blend DESCRIPTION : Be a bad ass Spiritual Gangsta and walk through this world being powerful and kind...to yourself and all beings. This blend is excellent to wear during meditation, yoga or simply when you are trying to feel more grounded in the middle of a crazy life! ACTIVATED CHAKRAS : 1st Root, 2nd Sacral, 3rd Solar Plexus, 4th Heart, 6th Third Eye, 7th Crown INSPIRATION & BENEFITS OF SPIRITUAL
